title: Every second counts
brief_description: This film is specifically aimed at the prevention of home accidents among children, but if they do occur then it also firmly spells out the immediate emergency procedures to follow. This documentary was produced with the cooperation of the Melbourne Royal Children’s Hospital. Viewing of this program should be restricted to parents or guardians.
